description:
Carry more fuel, cover more distance. This vest is no stranger to mountain marathons and alpine trail runs. Generous capacity carries up to 4 litres of water, split between bottles and a bladder. And there's ample room left over for bite-sized brownies, gummy bears and protein bars. We know mountains make their weather, so a handy bungee keeps your shell grabable when the clouds roll in.

  • 30-denier siliconized nylon on the main compartment is lightly weather-resistant and durable
  • Nylon/spandex mesh fabrics increase breathability and comfort through the chest
  • Comfort Cinch 2.0 adjustment lets you adjust the fit though the lower back
  • 2 sliding sternum straps are easy to adjust with one hand
  • Back sleeve accommodates up to a 3L water bladder (sold separately)
  • Bungee cord lets you carry extra gear for quick access
  • Included: 2 x 500mL BodyBottle II flasks
  • Zippered and phone-sized pockets offer plenty of storage
  • How to measure: circumference at the bottom of your rib cage
  • Recommended size: S for 58-81cm; M for 76-99cm; L for 98-117cm
name: Ultimate Direction Mountain Vest 5 - Unisex
